document_data.name: Trader's Rest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Trader's Rest''' was a [[caravanserai]] located in the city of [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The caravanserai was found near the center of Almorel, just down the street from the [[Hanging Place]] next to the [[Fief of the Lesser Lord]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The Trader's Rest was run by a [[Raumviran]] named [[M. V. Zapolsky]] in {{Yearlink|1357}}.
